I originally stayed at this location on my wedding night before departing on our honeymoon the next day. We had such an amazing time that as a birthday gift, my brother and sister in law decided to give my wife and I a romantic getaway. We were given a red carpet treatment at check in. The dinner was amazing, the room was decorated beautifully with roses and rose petals. Also, platters of fruits and sweets.....thenit turns out the assisted my sister in law and wife to surprise me that I am going to be a Dad...this was the best reveal and birthday gift ever....thank you Hilton and all of your staff...you guys are amazing and your premises and Customer Service is immaculate.

The best in tanger...next to garden inn.. I know a lot Hilton Hotels around the world- the worsest you find in the USA..- but this is first class !!! The stuff amazing...friendly and extrem attentively!!! I have a wonderful stay... Thanks a lot..

column3: New hotel near the beaches and mall
column4: We enjoyed our stay at the Hilton Tangier. This is a new hotel. I read reviews of people staying at older hotels who had to be dropped off a corner somewhere because the streets were too narrow for their taxi to make its way to the front of the hotel. I, personally, didn't want to have to drag my luggage through the streets of Tangier but I did want to be close to everything. The Hilton was great for that. This hotel does have security though. That was a first to me to see security protocols at a hotel. I was fine with it. Safety first. They have a large lobby with different areas of seatings. It seems they offer welcome drinks if you arrive between a certain time. We didn't arrive until midnight so there were no welcome drinks for us. We didn't take a cab from the airport. We‚Ä¶

column3: Luxury and service at every turn
column4: We experienced amazing service and luxury at this new hotel. Every member of the staff we've come in contact with has been incredible. Our room was beautiful, roomy, extremely clean, and very comfortable. This is already the luxury spot to stay in Tangier, and it will only get better once the new TGV depot opens next year just across the way.

column3: Excellent hotel - English-friendly - Fine Hilton property
column4: We stayed here for two days and enjoyed the hotel. The staff was efficient and friendly (with one exception - see below). Adil the concierge was fantastic in organizing tour arrangements and is friendly and personable. The rooms have adequate electric outlets and USB ports - excellent appointments and very quiet. Our special requests were accommodated. Bad news: We ordered room service both days - the first day it was perfect...but for day 2 we had to leave at 6:00 am so we called the night before to organize a 5;15 am to 5;30 am service. The operator remembered our order from the day before and even called back to confirm the time...unfortunately at 5:35 the food had not arrived. I called room service (25 rings and no answer) i called the front desk (25 rings and no‚Ä¶

Good business hotel. Breakfast not exceptional for a supposed 5* hotel, could be much better Pub too small to fit the customers at night . They try to send you to terrace where there is no vibe. Checking and check out pretty smooth with polite personnel Would go back

column3: we had a drink at the rooftop bar
column4: we walked into the place to the total indifference of the staff... We went from the inside to the terrasse and back a few times trying to decide where we were going to seat... All tables inside were reserved but it was completely empty including when we walked out an hour and a half later. We finally settled on the outside terrasse. The music was deafening even outside. The bar manager was almost permanently on his phone outside and very busy with personal matters. A very disappointing Hilton experience considering that I travel all year round. Icing on the cake, my credit card was debited twice for the amount of the bill.

The hotel just began their regular operation a few months ago. The architecture is modern with a touch of Moroccan style. I really liked it. From the restaurant (15th floor), there is a great view of the seqa and the shore.

After all of the riads, the Hilton city centre was a breath of fresh air. It's a new hotel, having opened in June 2017. The service was great and the room was modern and great. We had dinner at la kasbah. It had ocean views and the food was great. One of the best tagines I've had. Mehdi, our server, was great as well. The service was impeccable.

We loved this hotel - beautiful rooms, extremely comfortable bed, outstanding views and impeccable service. We didn't really get Tangier but loved our stay here - a very memorable experience. Cocktails on the top deck are a must - it was a real shame the pool was empty and out of action.

The hotel is super clean and the service is perfect, the hotel is a new construction. The rooms are very big and comfortable, linen are clean, Wi-Fi is perfectly working. We went to the gym and got steam bath. Breakfast was perfect, a lot of choice and all high quality food, we have to thanks Ilham that made our breakfast time perfect, she served us professionally and with a beautiful smile and kindness. We really love everything in this hotel.

I was in hotel 2 nights end of september. Booked and paid junior suite. They escort me to room. It was on a 3rd floor. Room was faceing to wall about 3 meters away. Some plants there for decoration but no wiew or natural light. Asked other room, they said no other junior suite free. I moved normal room in 7th floor. Get free lunch(main and desert) and promise look junior suite for tomorrow. I wanted to move cos paid 100 euro extra for that. Next afternoon they said there gonna be other room for me. Waitting almost 4 hours! They show me a junior suite on 4th floor. It was a smokeing room! This is Africa! Smell wasnt bad(New hotel) so stay there. It was 18.15 already. And there were no nespresso machine in room. There are Some really nice people working there. Some are lost.‚Ä¶

Me and my friends stayed for 4 nights in September! We have been welcomed really Proffesional by the executive lounge manager who prepared two nice rooms for us and made an early check-in possible! Everybody treated us so polite and friendly! Speachless!!! At the executive lounge, the staff was realy attentive to our needs and attended us every time with a smile! Karim at the breakfast was amazing, he anticipated our needs and remembered our names and preferences for the whole stay!!! Omer at the concierge exceeded our expectations for real! He was always willing to help and did his best to help us with the transportation to different cities around Tanger! Reda, the driver was a real proffesional and we would like to thank him for a very nice day in Chefchauen!! The hotel is‚Ä¶

column3: Best place to stay in Tangier
column4: This brand new Hilton in a wonderful location downtown Tangier offers great amenities and amazing views of the Atlantic Ocean. The staff is very well trained and the service delivery was outstanding. The rooms are very well appointed and pretty luxurious with very comfortable beds. The hotel is connected to a very nice mall. It offers a restaurant with great views, a "happening" night club and a rooftop terrace with live music in the evenings. We truly enjoyed our stay and will definitively be back.

column3: Almost perfect except at the Terrazza pool
column4: Hotel was really nice overall and near perfect for the service and maintenance. Breakfast was amazing and the view from the restaurant is superbe. Would highlight the very good professionalism and service oriented at the reception from Youness who has been up to high standard regarding our check in and making us feel very comfortable. The restaurant on the 15th floor was very good. We have had breakfast twice and again the team was very dedicated. Karim was very helpful and his capuccinos were among the best. So as family we were very happy overall. However I would like to draw attention about the pool and the Terraza restaurant which I believe is not up to a 5 star hotel and international service. Service was very slow and hygiene at the pool was shocking. Whilst we were‚Ä¶

My wife and I visited Morocco for the first time and we had a wonderful experience because of the people at the hotel, the Hilton facilities and the cultural experience while walking around the city of Tanger. Top our visit with a private tour with Abdul of TWIX Tours who made us comfortable throughout the whole day that included driving along the north Morocco coast on the way to Tetu√°n. Upon arrival for a three day stay the Hilton staff received us as royalty. We were given fresh and chilled tea that immediately relaxed us from the trip from Torremolinos in Spain. Our room was very clean, non-smoking, and very comfortable. It was much better than anticipated. Our stay at the Hilton Tanger City Center was perfect. And are seasoned travelers. The excellent attention from‚Ä¶

column3: Paid 400.00 2 am checkin bath didn't work
column4: My daughter and friend checked in exhausted at 2 am last Sunday August 20th after flight/ train delay ( couldn't check into air bnb ) and just wanted a hot bath and to sleep. The bath didn't work and instead of moving them to a different room they sent a REPAIRMAN to fix it til 3 am. For 400/ night I expect better from Hilton - frankly for 150/ night I'd expect better. How outrageous.

Good hotel I had great experience in this hotel, they have friendly staff everyone greets you with smile, good facilities the restaurant has nice view which is the best place that I enjoyed spending my time on it, finally I met a great guy who was working in this hotel he is a supervisor and he helped me a lot from the beginning of my arrival to this hotel till I left thanks to my friend youssri, wish all the best and off course If I came to tangier again Hilton will be my first choice.

What do you do when your overnight train from Tangier to Marrakesh gets cancelled right as you're about to board? You walk right across the street from the train station straight into the tall Hilton building. In a span of five minutes, we went from worrying about how we will sleep in this foreign city to some much-needed peace of mind. The moment we walked into the lobby, the hotel staff were gracious and sympathetic. They fixed us right up with a beautiful room and quick service. I don't know when this hotel officially opened up, but it definitely seemed brand new. The decor was awesome all around the hotel. The rooftop pool and lounge bar were also really nice, providing great views of the water and city along the shoreline. This hotel reminded me a lot of the hotels I'm used‚Ä¶

We stayed in this brand new hotel for two nights. I have been in many Hilton hotels all over the world and so far this is the best one I ever have been. Everything in this hotel is the best. My special thanks to the housekeeper ( Yousra ) who was also the babysitter of our daughter. We booked already again to be there from 16/09-18-09 to celebrate our 10 years anniversary

Stayed here for four nights and I could confidently claim that this wonderful hotel is the best in town. Location is great. Staff are extremely nice and helpful. Restaurants and food quality are great. Rooms are tidy and clean. Views from the 15th floor where swimming pool and restaurant are located are charming. Most of these features may be attributed to the fact that the hotel is very new. Therefore, I hope the level will be maintained or even made better in the long run.

We stayed in this wonderful brand new hotel for a week at the beginning of June, during their soft opening. The location is perfect and with a handy shopping mall attached to the hotel. The staff were all very friendly and helpful and even greeted us by our names, even though some of them have not met us before. This might not be important to other guests but it shows how dedicated, diligent and enthusiastic the staff are in this hotel. As a Hilton Honors Diamond member, we were accompanied by a very pleasant and friendly staff to check-in at their Executive Lounge on the 13th floor. We were promptly offered a delicious welcome drink while check-in. Being an elite member, we were offered complimentary access to the Executive Lounge and breakfast at the Kasbah restaurant,‚Ä¶

After arriving in Tangier on the overnight train from Marrakech we stopped at the Hilton on the recommendation of a fellow passenger. We were able to leave our bags at the front desk while we went upstairs for a buffet breakfast which was excellent. We also were allowed to go to the pool deck to experience the amazing view. The staff were friendly and helpful. We were even given a map of the Medina so we would not have to pay someone to show us our way around. I would definately go back again.

The Hilton is a great hotel in Tanger, the location is good next to the beach. My room was cleaned by Roukaya, and she did a excellent job. I highly recommend this Hotel . Tanger is a beautiful city. And Marokko is great!

One of the best hotels i have vested , friendly staff especially the house keeping team ( MEUNIA AND HANANE ) at the 5th floor . Ghezlan a front disk employee works very hard to make us happy all the time . I advise all tangier tourists to stay at this hotel they will never regretted .

Probably the best Hilton property I have ever stayed in, comparable to the likes of St Regises, Conrads and Ritzs. Amazing right from the moment I stepped into the property. Was attended promptly by Mr Adil Ait Lazrak who checked us in quickly and attended to all our needs. Even though there were no Diamond suite upgrades available, the room that we got was spacious and classy. All the staff was so friendly and helpful, I was so pampered. It felt like I had a personal butler who could anticipate my needs before I actually need them. And I thought that only Asian hotels were capable of delivering such extraordinary service. The view of the Atlantic Ocean from the terrace and the pool was so mind-blowing it could rival that of W Barcelona. Mr Karim and Mr Taufik from breakfast‚Ä¶
